channel.title: Pot Luck on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Pot Luck on mattischrome

item.title: I went to a pub quiz tonight
item.description: Ingrid and I joined our usual quiz team tonight for the residents’ association pub quiz. As usual we came third. It’s a fairly settled group of attendees and we know our level. We’re also quite used to the quiz master and his questions, though I do wish he’d acknowledge that pop music continued to be a thing long after the sixties! There’s always a pot luck round. On one round we get to play a joker which doubles your points.
